019package org.jgrapes.webconlet.examples.login;
020
021import freemarker.core.ParseException;
022import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
023import freemarker.template.Template;
024import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
025import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
026import java.beans.ConstructorProperties;
027import java.io.IOException;
028import java.io.StringWriter;
029import java.util.HashSet;
030import java.util.Map;
031import java.util.Optional;
032import java.util.Set;
033import java.util.concurrent.Future;
034import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
035import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
036import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
037import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
038import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
039import org.jgrapes.http.events.DiscardSession;
040import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
041import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConletBaseModel;
042import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleSession;
043import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.WebConsoleUtils;
044import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletRequest;
045import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletType;
046import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddPageResources.ScriptResource;
047import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.CloseModalDialog;
048import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsolePrepared;
049import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleReady;
050import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletModel;
051import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletView;
052import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.OpenModalDialog;
053import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConlet;
054import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequestBase;
055import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SetLocale;
056import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SimpleConsoleCommand;
057import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConlet;
058
059/**
060 * A conlet for poll administration.
061 */
062public class LoginConlet extends FreeMarkerConlet<LoginConlet.AccountModel> {
063
064    private static final String PENDING_CONSOLE_PREPARED
065        = "pendingCosolePrepared";
066
067    /**
068     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
069     * 
070     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
071     *            on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
072     *            sends the event to
073     */
074    public LoginConlet(Channel componentChannel) {
075        super(componentChannel);
076    }
077
078    @Override
079    protected String generateInstanceId(AddConletRequest event,
080            ConsoleSession session) {
081        return "Singleton";
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Register conlet.
086     *
087     * @param event the event
088     * @param channel the channel
089     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
090     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name exception
091     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
092     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
093     */
094    @Handler
095    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event, ConsoleSession channel)
096            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
097            ParseException, IOException {
098        // Add conlet resources to page
099        channel.respond(new AddConletType(type())
100            .addScript(new ScriptResource()
101                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
102                    type(), "Login-functions.js"))
103                .setScriptType("module"))
104            .addCss(event.renderSupport(), WebConsoleUtils.uriFromPath(
105                "Login-style.css"))
106            .addPageContent("headerIcons", Map.of("priority", "1000"))
107            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.Content));
108    }
109
110    /**
111     * As a model has already been created in {@link #doUpdateConletState},
112     * the "new" model may already exist in the session.
113     */
114    @Override
115    protected Optional<AccountModel> createNewState(AddConletRequest event,
116            ConsoleSession session, String conletId) throws Exception {
117        Optional<AccountModel> model
118            = stateFromSession(session.browserSession(), conletId);
119        if (model.isPresent()) {
120            return model;
121        }
122        return super.createNewState(event, session, conletId);
123    }
124
125    @Override
126    protected Optional<AccountModel> createStateRepresentation(
127            RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
128            ConsoleSession channel, String conletId) throws IOException {
129        return Optional.of(new AccountModel(conletId));
130    }
131
132    /**
133     * Handle web console page loaded.
134     *
135     * @param event the event
136     * @param channel the channel
137     * @throws IOException 
138     * @throws ParseException 
139     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException 
140     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException 
141     */
142    @Handler(priority = 1000)
143    public void onConsolePrepared(ConsolePrepared event, ConsoleSession channel)
144            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
145            ParseException, IOException {
146        // If we are logged in, proceed
147        String conletId = type() + TYPE_INSTANCE_SEPARATOR + "Singleton";
148        if (stateFromSession(channel.browserSession(), conletId)
149            .map(model -> model.getUserName() != null).orElse(false)) {
150            return;
151        }
152
153        // Suspend handling and save event "in" channel.
154        event.suspendHandling();
155        channel.setAssociated(PENDING_CONSOLE_PREPARED, event);
156
157        // Create model and save in session.
158        AccountModel accountModel = new AccountModel(conletId);
159        accountModel.setDialogOpen(true);
160        putInSession(channel.browserSession(), conletId, accountModel);
161
162        // Render login dialog
163        Template tpl = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("Login-dialog.ftl.html");
164        var bundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
165        channel.respond(new OpenModalDialog(type(), conletId,
166            processTemplate(event, tpl,
167                fmSessionModel(channel.browserSession())))
168                    .addOption("title", bundle.getString("title"))
169                    .addOption("cancelable", false).addOption("okayLabel", "")
170                    .addOption("applyLabel", bundle.getString("Submit"))
171                    .addOption("useSubmit", true));
172    }
173
174    private Future<String> processTemplate(
175            Event<?> request, Template template,
176            Object dataModel) {
177        return request.processedBy().map(procBy -> procBy.executorService())
178            .orElse(Components.defaultExecutorService()).submit(() -> {
179                StringWriter out = new StringWriter();
180                try {
181                    template.process(dataModel, out);
182                } catch (TemplateException | IOException e) {
183                    throw new IllegalArgumentException(e);
184                }
185                return out.toString();
186
187            });
188    }
189
190    @Override
191    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
192            ConsoleSession channel, String conletId,
193            AccountModel model) throws Exception {
194        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = new HashSet<>();
195        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Content)) {
196            Template tpl
197                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("Login-status.ftl.html");
198            channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
199                processTemplate(event, tpl,
200                    fmModel(event, channel, conletId, model)))
201                        .setRenderAs(RenderMode.Content));
202            channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(), conletId,
203                "updateUser", model.getUserName()));
204            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.Content);
205        }
206        return renderedAs;
207    }
208
209    @Override
210    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
211            ConsoleSession channel, AccountModel model) throws Exception {
212        if ("loginData".equals(event.method())) {
213            model.setDialogOpen(false);
214            model.setUserName(event.params().asString(0));
215            model.setPassword(event.params().asString(1).toCharArray());
216            channel.respond(new CloseModalDialog(type(), event.conletId()));
217            channel.associated(PENDING_CONSOLE_PREPARED, ConsolePrepared.class)
218                .ifPresentOrElse(ConsolePrepared::resumeHandling,
219                    () -> channel.respond(new SimpleConsoleCommand("reload")));
220            return;
221        }
222        if ("logout".equals(event.method())) {
223            channel.respond(new DiscardSession(channel.browserSession(),
224                channel.webletChannel()));
225            channel.respond(new SimpleConsoleCommand("reload"));
226        }
227    }
228
229    @Override
230    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleSession channel,
231            String conletId) throws Exception {
232        return stateFromSession(channel.browserSession(),
233            type() + TYPE_INSTANCE_SEPARATOR + "Singleton")
234                .map(model -> !model.isDialogOpen()).orElse(true);
235    }
236
237    /**
238     * Model with account info.
239     */
240    @SuppressWarnings({ "serial", "PMD.DataClass" })
241    public static class AccountModel extends ConletBaseModel {
242
243        private boolean dialogOpen;
244        private String userName;
245        private transient char[] password;
246
247        /**
248         * Creates a new model with the given type and id.
249         * 
250         * @param conletId the web console component id
251         */
252        @ConstructorProperties({ "conletId" })
253        public AccountModel(String conletId) {
254            super(conletId);
255        }
256
257        /**
258         * Checks if is dialog open.
259         *
260         * @return true, if is dialog open
261         */
262        public boolean isDialogOpen() {
263            return dialogOpen;
264        }
265
266        /**
267         * Sets the dialog open.
268         *
269         * @param dialogOpen the new dialog open
270         */
271        public void setDialogOpen(boolean dialogOpen) {
272            this.dialogOpen = dialogOpen;
273        }
274
275        /**
276         * Gets the user name.
277         *
278         * @return the user name
279         */
280        public String getUserName() {
281            return userName;
282        }
283
284        /**
285         * Sets the user name.
286         *
287         * @param userName the new user name
288         */
289        public void setUserName(String userName) {
290            this.userName = userName;
291        }
292
293        /**
294         * Gets the password.
295         *
296         * @return the password
297         */
298        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.MethodReturnsInternalArray")
299        public char[] getPassword() {
300            return password;
301        }
302
303        /**
304         * Sets the password.
305         *
306         * @param password the new password
307         */
308        @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.UseVarargs", "PMD.ArrayIsStoredDirectly" })
309        public void setPassword(char[] password) {
310            this.password = password;
311        }
312
313    }
314
315}
